modName: Thalmor Viceroy Inquisitors Clothes - Silver Retexture
summary: A simple alternative texture replacement for Killerkeos Thalmor Viceroy Inquisitors Clothes to change the gold embellishments to silver.
descriptionHtml:
Thalmor Viceroy Inquisitors Clothes - Texture Replacer
_____________________________________________________

This is a simple texture replacement for Killerkeo's Thalmor Viceroy Inquisitors Clothes. I love the outfit, but I'm not a big fan of gold on jewelry or other metal/metallic embellishments. I simply took Killerkeo's awesome textures and changed the gold striping to silver.

REQUIREMENTS
____________________________

Since this is just a texture replacement, you need to have the original mod, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28926]Thalmor Viceroy Inquisitors Clothes[/url] for it to have any function.

Installation
____________________________

1. Download with NMM and activate
2. Enjoy!

OR

1. Download manually
2. Extract the file to your Skyrim Data folder
3. Enjoy!

Changelog
____________________________

1.0 - Release

I don't anticipate any real reason that there should be any updates, unless the texture mapping for the outfit changes.

Credits
____________________________

Killerkeo for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28926]Thalmor Viceroy Inquisitors Clothes[/url] and original textures
Thanks to him for all his great work on this and all his other outfits!
author: Pyrospyder
